scene_description_enriched: A circular emblem is depicted, framed by a red border with ornate red and gold patterns. Inside the emblem, on a blue background, are three golden fish swimming in the same direction. The emblem itself is set within a larger decorative border that includes blue and red elements.
scene_interpretation: This is a heraldic emblem, likely representing a family crest or a specific coat of arms. The fish motif can have various symbolic meanings in Christian iconography, such as representing Christ (Ichthys) or the apostles, but without further context, it is primarily a heraldic device.
